verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> [T'al-upon הַגִּתִּ֑ית <WH1665> hag-git-Tit; upon Gittith לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> liv-nei- for the sons קֹ֥רַח <WH7141> Ko-rach of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> miz-Mor. A Psalm מַה־ <WH4100> mah- How יְּדִיד֥וֹת <WH3039> ye-di-Dot How amiable מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH4908> mish-ke-no-Tei-cha, [are] thy tabernacles יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> tze-va-'ot. of hosts

נִכְסְפָ֬ה <WH3700> nich-se-Fah longeth וְגַם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- and even כָּלְתָ֨ה׀ <WH3615> kal-Tah yea even fainteth נַפְשִׁי֮ <WH5315> naf-Shi My soul לְחַצְר֪וֹת <WH2691> le-chatz-Rot for the courts יְה֫וָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD לִבִּ֥י <WH3820> lib-Bi my heart וּבְשָׂרִ֑י <WH1320> u-ve-sa-Ri; and my flesh יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ <WH7442> ye-ran-ne-Nu, crieth out אֶ֣ל <WH413> 'el about אֵֽל־ <WH410> 'el- God חָֽי׃ <WH2416> Chai. for the living

גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- also צִפּ֨וֹר׀ <WH6833> tzip-Por Yea the sparrow מָ֪צְאָה <WH4672> Ma-tze-'ah hath found בַ֡יִת <WH1004> Va-yit an house וּדְר֤וֹר׀ <WH1866> u-de-Ror and the swallow קֵ֥ן <WH7064> ken a nest לָהּ֮ lah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- where שָׁ֪תָה <WH7896> Sha-tah for herself where she may lay אֶפְרֹ֫חֶ֥יהָ <WH667> 'ef-Ro-Chei-ha her young אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- מִ֭זְבְּחוֹתֶיךָ <WH4196> Miz-be-cho-tei-cha [even] thine altars יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot; of hosts מַ֝לְכִּ֗י <WH4428> mal-Ki, my King וֵאלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> ve-lo-Hai. and my God

אַ֭שְׁרֵי <WH835> 'Ash-rei Blessed יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei [are] they that dwell בֵיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> vei-Te-cha; in thy house ע֝֗וֹד <WH5750> od, are ever יְֽהַלְל֥וּךָ <WH1984> ye-hal-Lu-cha they will be still praising סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. thee Selah

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <WH835> 'ash-Rei Blessed אָ֭דָם <WH120> 'A-dom [is] the man עֽוֹז־ <WH5797> 'oz- whose strength ל֥וֹ lo בָ֑ךְ Vach; מְ֝סִלּ֗וֹת <WH4546> me-sil-Lot, [are] the ways בִּלְבָבָֽם׃ <WH3824> bil-va-Vam. [is] in thee in whose heart

עֹבְרֵ֤י׀ <WH5674> 'oe-Rei [Who] passing בְּעֵ֣מֶק <WH6010> be-'E-mek through the valley הַ֭בָּכָא <WH1056> Hab-ba-cha of Baca מַעְיָ֣ן <WH4599> ma'-Yan it a well יְשִׁית֑וּהוּ <WH7896> ye-shi-Tu-hu; make גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- also בְּ֝רָכ֗וֹת <WH1293> be-ra-Chot, the pools יַעְטֶ֥ה <WH5844> ya'-Teh also filleth מוֹרֶֽה׃ <WH4175> mo-Reh. the rain

יֵ֭לְכוּ <WH1980> Ye-le-chu go מֵחַ֣יִל <WH2428> me-Cha-yil from strength אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- before חָ֑יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil; to strength יֵרָאֶ֖ה <WH7200> ye-ra-'Eh appeareth אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- before אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him before God בְּצִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> be-tzi-Yon. [every one of them] in Zion

יְה֘וָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God צְ֭בָאוֹת <WH6635> Tze-va-'ot of hosts שִׁמְעָ֣ה <WH8085> shim-'Ah hear תְפִלָּתִ֑י <WH8605> te-fil-la-Ti; my prayer הַאֲזִ֨ינָה <WH238> ha-'a-Zi-nah give ear אֱלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei O God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

מָ֭גִנֵּנוּ <WH4043> Ma-gin-ne-nu our shield רְאֵ֣ה <WH7200> re-'Eh Behold אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; O God וְ֝הַבֵּ֗ט <WH5027> ve-hab-Bet, and look פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei upon the face מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ <WH4899> me-shi-Che-cha. of thine anointed

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for טֽוֹב־ <WH2896> tov- [is] better י֥וֹם <WH3117> Yom For a day בַּחֲצֵרֶ֗יךָ <WH2691> ba-cha-tze-Rei-cha, in thy courts מֵ֫אָ֥לֶף <WH505> me-'A-lef than a thousand בָּחַ֗רְתִּי <WH977> ba-Char-ti, I had rather הִ֭סְתּוֹפֵף <WH5605> His-to-fef be a doorkeeper בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> be-Veit in the house אֱלֹהַ֑י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai; of my God מִ֝דּ֗וּר <WH1752> mid-Dur, than to dwell בְּאָהֳלֵי־ <WH168> be-'o-ho-lei- in the tents רֶֽשַׁע׃ <WH7562> Re-sha'. of wickedness

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki is a שֶׁ֨מֶשׁ׀ <WH8121> She-mesh [is] a sun וּמָגֵן֮ <WH4043> u-ma-Gen and shield יְהוָ֪ה <WH3068> Yah-weh For the LORD אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God חֵ֣ן <WH2580> chen grace וְ֭כָבוֹד <WH3519> Ve-cha-Vod and glory יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit-Ten will give יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo No יִמְנַע־ <WH4513> yim-na'- [thing] will he withhold ט֝֗וֹב <WH2896> Tov, no good לַֽהֹלְכִ֥ים <WH1980> la-ho-le-Chim from them that walk בְּתָמִֽים׃ <WH8549> be-ta-Mim. uprightly
יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot; of hosts אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י <WH835> 'ash-Rei blessed אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, [is] the man בֹּטֵ֥חַ <WH982> bo-Te-ach that trusteth בָּֽךְ׃ Bach.
